tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genomic_data (
  experiment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  position INT,
  nucleotide VARCHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE SequencingData (
  sequencing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  sequence_data TEXT,
  sequencing_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES Experiment(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_information (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(255),
  organism VARCHAR(255),
  tissue_type VARCHAR(255),
  experiment_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiment_data(experiment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  result_summary TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_information(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name TEXT,
  experiment_date DATE,
  researcher_name TEXT,
  notes TEXT)

CREATE TABLE samples (sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name TEXT,
  sample_type TEXT,
  experiment_id UUID,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id))

CREATE TABLE sequencing_results (result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id UUID,
  sequencing_date DATE,
  sequencing_data BYTEA,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES samples(sample_id))

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  result_id UUID,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_method TEXT,
  analysis_report TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (result_id) REFERENCES sequencing_results(result_id))

CREATE TABLE annotations (annotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  result_id UUID,
  annotation_type TEXT,
  annotation_data JSON,
  FOREIGN KEY (result_id) REFERENCES sequencing_results(result_id))
